page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT AND INDUSTRY
page.content: There is a large number of housewives in the village (39%) but many of them work full or part time. A very small number of people are unemployed, and a quarter of the adult population is retired. A good proportion of village people are agricultural workers, and the majority of the inhabitants either work within the Parish or the surrounding districts. The poultry processing unit within the village offers employment to many, and the other two industrial sites, one concerned with concrete and one manufacturing caravans, offer further opportunities for employment.
